title: Grow Your Dream: A Guide to a Productive Vegetable Garden

tasks.task: Dreaming of and creating a vegetable garden
subtasks: Choosing vegetable types based on climate and preferences
Planting vegetables in well-draining, enriched soil
Following planting depth and spacing instructions
Monitoring for pests and diseases, using organic methods
Providing support to growing plants (stakes, cages, trellises)
Harvesting vegetables at the right time using sharp tools
Starting the process (plant selection, planting, care)
Adjusting care as needed (additional support, different watering needs)
Patience and love for the garden
